title: What do people from India think of the fact that Native Americans are sometimes called 'Indians'? What do Native Americans think? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Last time I was in the USA I became friends with some Hopi people. To my surprise they preferred American Indian to Native American. I have also seen an opinion poll that also suggested that American Indian was preferred by the majority of the ‘indigenous’ population.
Apart from the fact that it may cause some annoying confusion at times, I (as an Indian from India), do not really care.
